Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1967...
Injured on 4/15/1969 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/21/1971 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles to Minnesota on 7/23/1972 (Going to LA: P J. Hiller. Going to MIN: 2B B. Grich)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1973, off Don Loun (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1973, off Mickey Lolich (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/7/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
